title: POI S3E17 / [root path], p3 [Root, Root x Shaw]
author: Root & Shaw
comment: I love how root gives her the breakfast bar <3

Well, this is Root's episode to shine.  I think Root is quite a complex character, and not necessarily likable, even when she's one of the "good guys," and  I wonder how someone else besides Amy would have played the role, if they could have pulled it off so well.

"Seems pretty clear to me, Finch" 😂
"I think she likes you, Harold" 🤣
"Don't make me look bad." "...I couldn't make you look bad if I tried." #GOTCHA!!!

0:40
Same thing Finch said to John...
description:
Root tries to warn Finch about the dangers of Samaritan coming online; she's one of The Good Guys, now!
Root couldn't make Shaw look bad if she tried. 

Episode summary:
The Machine orders Root on several tasks such as helping a convict escape and using him to impersonate a Department of Defense employee in order to obtain a secret note. Afterward, she and Harold's team coincidentally reach the same person, a janitor. It later turns out that NSA has been testing an advanced supercomputing chip and the janitor was one of the 15 people who had access to the development lab. This makes both Decima and Vigilance come after him. Whilst Harold and his team's assignment was to protect the janitor, Root had to stop the chip from falling into Decima's hands. They are able to save the janitor, but Decima gets the chip.

March 18, 2014
